predicate.note: Frames file for 'demean' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive
example.text: No , we ought [*-2] to be mad because he has demeaned the office [0] we gave him [*T*-1] , [*-3] enlisting it in the service of private gain , just as we ought [*-4] to be mad that public officials lie through their teeth , play disingenuous games about their activities or , [*] to steal a phrase , make public service a private trough .
example.arg: [*-3] enlisting it in the service of private gain
